name: Wasteland (itch) (Delthor)
description:
This is my third game and I made it in just a few days in line with the realeased Blackthornprond tutorial in Udemy, which I recommend to anybody starting to make videogames.

It is a game with very flexible scripts so I will probably add new types of enemies and weapons soon. Again, I apologize for my artwork and music in the game, because I am not very god at them and I did not have much time.

Wasteland is a nice, few minutes experience in which you have to shoot enemies of different types that will try to kill you. Use WASD to move and your mouse to aim and shoot. Have fun and leave some comments!

Thanks again to  Blackthornprod (and his brother) for all the free (and not so free, in this case) content they have published which helps other people start their game creation journeys.
